channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- Universal CMDB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- Universal CMDB

item.title: CVE-2018-6491|2024-08-05T06:01:49.261Z -- micro%20focus -- universal%20cmdb
item.description: Local Escalation of Privilege vulnerability to Micro Focus Universal CMDB, versions 10.20, 10.21, 10.22, 10.30, 10.31, 10.32, 10.33, 11.00. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to Local Escalation of Privilege.
